name: UltimateLootGrind
description:
A highly addictive game, easy to learn, even easier to play. Start the Ultimate Loot Grind. Constantly upgrade your equipment and climb the leaderboard.

Join us right from the alpha and help to improve the game.

The game is currently in development. Current release status: 0.1.0 - Alpha One - Playable

Features already included in the game:

  • 5 out of 13 different levels of rarity
  • Nearly 300 different items
  • Mechanics for looting and equipping items
  • Save your progress

Planned features for the game:

  • A trader who will gladly take your gold in exchange for new goods
  • Artefacts with special effects
  • A ranking list to compete with other players
  • and many more special features

Download the game now and start the grind right away!

Also join our Discord Community to be directly informed about new content and development status: https://discord.gg/FtgJeRX9Tg

Also ff you find any bugs or have any suggestions for the game, please let me know in the Discord.
